mapper.select: select r.review_id, r.review_date, r.review_title, r.review_content, r.review_rate, u.username, u.name, f.file_convert as review_image from review r join users u on r.user_id = u.user_id left join files f on r.file_id = f.file_id where r.moim_id = #{moimId} order by r.review_date desc
